content: As an AI language model, I don't have my preferences or emotions. However, during weekends and summer months, Yosemite National Park can become crowded with visitors, which may lead to traffic congestion, limited parking, long wait times at popular attractions, and crowded trails. Moreover, the prices of lodging and camping are higher during these peak times. But if you don't mind the crowds and high prices, you can still enjoy the park's beauty and activities, but be prepared for potentially larger crowds.
